entry.summary: November 30, 2024 6:00 a.m. An Air Stagnation Advisory is in effect through 4:00 p.m. Wednesday for parts of southern Oregon. entry.title: CITY OF ROSEBURG HOMELESS COMMISSION MEETING CANCELED
entry.summary: November 29, 2024 9:30 a.m. The Roseburg Homeless Commission meeting scheduled for Monday night December 23rd has been cancelled. entry.title: Lung Cancer Screening Saves Lives: What to Know & Expect
entry.summary: November is lung cancer awareness month and one of the most critical times of year for me to talk to my patients about the importance of lung cancer screening, even if you don’t think you may be at risk.

entry.title: Select hotels in UNESCO World Heritage Sites
entry.summary: UNESCO World Heritage sites are unique and stunning landmarks — both natural and manmade — spread across the globe. Visiting them is a terrific way to enjoy new experiences and learn about different cultures.

entry.title: THANKSGIVING HOLIDAY CLOSURES
entry.summary: November 28, 2024 6:00 a.m. Thursday, November 28th is the Thanksgiving Holiday in the United States. That means federal, state, county and city offices are closed. Regular mail will not be delivered. Schools are not in session. Banks and credit unions are closed. Professional offices are not open. Many retail stores are closed or will...

entry.title: Sale of equestrian resort property falls through
entry.summary: OAKLAND — The sale of 2,800 acres near Oakland, which was slated to be developed into an equestrian resort, fell through for the second time, casting doubt on the future of the proposed project.
